title: [100pt] Product Management

title: [20pt] Compliance - General
body: Ensure we meet all certification & rating requirements for launch

body: Keep track of expenses

body: Integrate our builds with online stores and fill out necessary forms

body: Key distribution for Native peoples

title: [10pt] Online Stores - Tools Programming
body: Tools for publishing the game in app stores

title: [100pt] Community Manager
body: Manage the community communication via reddit & discord etc

body: Extra community management help for the launch
